Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 2 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Eye Rays, Each of the 4 eye stalks on the Spectator's head which have each been given a very descriptive name
Other Actions.Action 2: Confusion Ray, The Spectator attempts to confuse a target
Other Actions.Action 3: Paralyzing Ray, The Spectator attempts to paralyze a target
Other Actions.Action 4: Fear Ray, The Spectator attempts to frighten a target
Other Actions.Action 5: Wounding Ray, The Spectator blasts a target with a necrotic ray
Other Actions.Action 6: Create Food and Water, The Spectator magically creates enough food and water to sustain itself
Other Actions.Action 7: Spell Reflection, If the Spectator succeeds against a spell save or a spell attack misses it, the Spectator can redirect the spell at another target it can see (Reaction)
